## NFTCollection.updateSettings() method

Update the settings of the collection

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateSettings(settings: {
        creators?: CreatorInput[];
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                      | Description            |
| --------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| settings  | { creators?: [CreatorInput](./sdk.creatorinput.md)\[\]; } | the settings to update |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
